alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 12:16PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Yakima County through 1245 PM PDT... At 1216 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Yakama Reservation, or 33 miles northwest of Goldendale, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Yakama Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Simcoe Highlands
